Description:
PN/SL/HCC/10022022/01 - 312259634
Served for failing to provide evidence that air quality checks have been undertaken on the air supply to your respiratory protective system.

IN/SL/HCC/10022022/01   312312357
You have failed to appoint one or more competent persons to assist you in undertaking the measures you need to take to fully comply with relevant health and safety legislation.

IN/SL/HCC/10022022/02    312312371
You have failed to ensure that employees exposed to isocyanate, a substance which is hazardous to health and is a respiratory sensitiser, are under suitable health surveillance.
